name: ResourceBot
description: A resource management tool for guilds

GRB_DISCORD_TOKEN.description: In Discord's developer area, reveal and copy 'Token'. Paste it here.

CHANNEL.description: Enter the name of your bot's channel on your Discord server, WITHOUT THE #.

LANGUAGE.description: guildwide default language setting [de, en, es, fr, it, pt]

OCR_RESULT.description: If set to 'on', the bot will show the results after processing screenshots.

DELETE_PICTURE_MESSAGE.description: If set to 'on', the bot will delete screenshots after processing them.

JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS.description: memory instructions so this project can run on a free Heroku plan; DO NOT CHANGE!!

TESS_DATA.description: path for the tessdata files; DO NOT CHANGE!!
